content: Hey Gary… my biggest take away from the video is that everyone needs to figure out who they are and what works for them. No argument that your method works for you. It fits who you are and your personality. The methods that work for you aren’t Seth Godin’s methods, or Liz Gilbert’s, or Steven Pressfield’s… I could go on, but you get the point. A lot of people don’t have self awareness, so that’s where it starts. So the takeaway is a 2 step process. (1) Figure out who YOU are. (2) Hustle.
